item.description:
Rise of the Goblin Guild: When a monster is discovered on the grounds of the Pathfinder Lodge at Heidmarch Manor in Magnimar, an investigation into its appearance leads the PCs deep under the City of Monuments—and face to face with a burgeoning thieves’ guild.
TnT is the first store in MA to be running a Season 4 scenario. Veteran GM and PFS Adventure Lieutenant Lucas Servideo is running the event. The fun starts at 5PM. Each session is limited to six players, but we can create more tables as needed. Please RSVP either on Warhorn or http://www.facebook.com/events/341822702566132/ to reserve a spot

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: Rise of the Goblin Guild (PFS 4-01) at TnT
